snippet: The first Congressional hearing focused on the Sept. 16 shooting at the Washington Navy Yard has been postponed indefinitely because of the government shutdown.
abstract: The first Congressional hearing focused on the Sept. 16 shooting at the Washington Navy Yard has been postponed indefinitely because of the government shutdown.

headline.main: Senate Cancels First Hearing on Navy Yard Shooting
